title: Walmart Clearance: FitBit Flex Possibly Only $24 (Regularly $99.95)
text:
Walmart Shoppers! If youâ€™re headed into your local Walmart store any time in the near future, be sure to keep your eyes peeled for possible clearance deals on a FitBit Flex ! You may be able to score one in Black or Slate for just $24 (reg. $99.95).
Be sure to price check as you can see from the pics above, this item was marked at $40 but when price checked, they rang up at $24. Keep in mind that clearance prices can vary greatly from store to store.

To see if this FitBit Flex is in stock at your local store and/or what the current price is, just click on the links above and enter your zip code to search.
